text: Robert Lima Guimarães (born 2 January 1987), commonly known as Robert Gladiador, is a Brazilian footballer who last plays as a forward for Arema. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Lajeadense |2012 |colspan="3" rowspan="6"|– |0||0||9Appearances in the Campeonato Gaúcho||1||9||1 |- |Passo Fundo |2013 |0||0||4||0||4||0 |- |Esportivo |2014 |0||0||9||0||9||0 |- |Brasil de Farroupilha |2015 |0||0||8Appearances in the Campeonato Gaúcho Série B||0||8||0 |- |Itapemirim |2016 |0||0||2Appearances in the Campeonato Capixaba||0||2||0 |- |Estrela do Norte |2017 |0||0||9Appearances in the Campeonato Capixaba A2||2||9||2 |- |Arema |2019 |Liga 1 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- !
